meanings.definition: A sweet pastry made of layers of filo dough filled with chopped nuts and sweetened with syrup or honey.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a piece of baklava after dinner.
meanings.sent2: My grandma's baklava recipe is the best in town.
meanings.sent3: The baklava was so sweet, it made my teeth ache!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as layered and sweet as a piece of baklava.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of baklava filled the kitchen, tempting everyone.

meanings.definition: A dessert typically made with layers of filo pastry, chopped nuts, and honey or syrup.
meanings.sent1: During the festival, vendors sold delicious baklava.
meanings.sent2: The bakery displayed a variety of baklava in their window.
meanings.sent3: The baklava disappeared quickly at the party, leaving everyone wanting more.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sweet and nutty as a piece of baklava.
meanings.sent5: The golden layers of baklava glistened under the lights, inviting me to take a bite.
